name: Storybook (ipanr)
description:
Submission to "48 to play" Game Jam. It's a 3D game where you can switch perspective to make it a 2D game. 

WASD to move and JKLI to change camera pesrpective.

A project by @Bixelium Entertainment.

Developed by @IPanRguez

Art by @Alexo_Torrez  and @MaxSalazar3D

Music by Roberto Vargas http://mistngreed.blogspot.com/
